alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 2:46AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to locally heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Koochiching and North Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Deer Creek areas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy band of snow is expected this morning before another period of rain mixed with snow is expected this afternoon. A second round of heavy snow is possible early Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
